# logstream #

### Run from source ###

```bash
./src/logstream/logstream.py
```

### Install via pip ###

```bash
pip install logstream
```

```text
Usage: logstream

    --help
    --version
    --format [type]

    type darwin:
        [default|compact|json|ndjson|syslog]

    type linux:
        [short|short-full|short-unix|verbose|export]
        [json|json-pretty|json-sse|json-seq]

    --tail file

```

---

Version: 0.0.0
